scripts.setup: cd proyecto && npm i && cd .. && cd frontend && npm i && cd .. && npm run setup:serv
scripts.setup:win: cd proyecto && npm i && cd .. && cd frontend && npm i && cd .. && npm run setup:serv:win
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build && npm run export
scripts.deploy:full: npm run deploy:terraform && npm run deploy && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:win:full: npm run deploy:terraform && npm run deploy:win && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.remove:full: npm run remove && npm run remove:terraform
